name: sharkkey
description: ðŸ¦ˆðŸ”‘ | averege encryption with a twist or two

scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/esbuild ./src/index.js --bundle --outdir=bundle --platform=node && pkg -t node16-win-x64  ./bundle/index.js --compress GZip -o dist/sharkkey-win-x64 && pkg -t node16-linux-x64  ./bundle/index.js --compress GZip  -o dist/sharkkey-linux-x64 && pkg -t node16-macos-x64  ./bundle/index.js --compress GZip  -o dist/sharkkey-macos-x64
scripts.build-win-path: .\node_modules\.bin\esbuild .\src\index.js --bundle --outdir=bundle --platform=node && pkg -t node16-win-x64  .\bundle\index.js --compress GZip -o dist/sharkkey-win-x64 && pkg -t node16-linux-x64  .\bundle\index.js --compress GZip  -o dist/sharkkey-linux-x64

author: Lunar
